answers.answer: Hi there!I would assume him to be treated for melanoma. Body odour could occur due to poor hygiene, infections (fungal, bacterial or parasitic), hormonal changes, hyperhydrosis, some metabolic disorders, a few foods like spices garlic etc, stale sweat, penile discharge, gastrointestinal disorders, diabetes, ketoacidosis, urinary tract infection, scurvy etc. I would suggest getting this evaluated by a primary care physician/ internist and depending on the cause diagnosed/ suspected, it can be managed accordingly or specialist care may be sought.Hope this is helpful.Take care!
